name: Ren
description:
Ren is my first Indie game I have made and published. It is about a man called Ren, he was born into the Tanso Clan. The Tanso Clan have been enslaved by all the other clans since the start of time. So Ren want's to get revenge on everyone.

Controls: 

A- Move Left

D-Move Right

Space- Jump

Left Mouse Click- Primary Attack

Right Mouse Click- Secondary Attack
